item.title: Org-Clock Export as Charts
item.description: Managing my time I really like Emacs. I won’t go into a tribute to this piece of software, many have done it before. I also really like org-mode, and I’m not the only one (see here, here and there). One of the cool feature of org-mode is clocking. It allows you to indicate that which TODO you are working on and progressively build up a detailed account of the way you are spending your time.
